Salutations friends

 Figured we'd spread some love and get some offers on. 

Stratagem Hosting - AS212806 - UK (West Midlands) based with fully owned infrastructure & Juniper network. A premium tier 1 blend ensures the best connectivity possible. We will always go the extra mile for our clients. 
_/ˈstratədʒəm/ - A plan, especially one used to outwit an opponent or achieve an end_

[Tritium](https://clients.stratagem.host/cart.php?a=add&pid=50 "Tritium") VPS - £15/year with promo **TopVPS21**
* 1 Core (Intel V2) 
* 1GB RAM
* 20GB SSD
* 1 IPv4 & /112 IPv6 (free routed /64)
* 2TB @ 200Mbps*


[Argon](https://clients.stratagem.host/cart.php?a=add&pid=7 "Argon") VPS - £40/year with promo **BestLET40** -  only five available though!
* 2 Cores (AMD EPYC) 
* 2GB RAM
* 30GB SSD
* 1 IPv4 & /112 IPv6 (free routed /64)
* 3TB @ 1Gbps*


[Colocation](https://clients.stratagem.host/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=3 "Colocation") - Six months half price with promo **COLOCO6**
* 1U
* 0.5A Dual Feed Power
* /29 IPv4 + /64 IPv6 (free routed /48)
* 50TB @ 1Gbps port (10gbps ports available)
* ISO 27001 and ISO 9001 Datacenters
* 30 Minutes RH included
~~£49~~ First six months - £24.50



Bandwidth* - It wouldn't be LET without some bandwidth doubling so drop your order number in the comments and you can have _triple_ bandwidth. 


FAQ:

Q: Can these offers be customised?
A: These particular offers no, however get in touch and we'll always be happy to work something out for you.

Q: Are these offers recurring?
A: Save for the collocation offer which is a six month offer, yes. 

Q: What technology is in use here?
A: Virtualizor KVM for the time being. 

Q: Is VAT included on these prices?
A: All prices unless otherwise stated exclude VAT. 

Q: Is BGP included?
A: Yes - BGP can be freely included for any VPS or colocation order. 

Q: Can I bring my own IP addresses?
A: Sure, no problem. We can either announce these for you or we can setup a BGP session.

Q: Can I ship my hardware for colocation?
A: Yes - we offer a free unpack & rack option to anybody that would like to take advantage.

Q: Can I check your network?
A: Usually yes however our Looking Glass (based on [Hyperglass](https://hyperglass.dev "Hyperglass")) is currently having some bug fixes done - you can ping/trace/MTR to 185.175.90.11 though.

Any questions? Let us know.
